metadata.title: CVE-2022-0301 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Heap buffer overflow in DevTools in Google Chrome prior to 97.0.4692.99allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install a malicious extensionto potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
